name: CHHapticDynamicParameter
desc: A value that you send to a haptic pattern player to alter a property value during playback.

items.name: init(parameterID: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID, value: Float, relativeTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a dynamic parameter from its ID, value, and start time.

items.name: struct CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: The identifier that reveals the type of property associated with a dynamic parameter.

items.name: var parameterID: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: The dynamic parameter ID defining the type of parameter being modified.

items.name: var relativeTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time at which this dynamic parameter is applied, relative to the start time of the pattern.

items.name: var value: Float
items.desc: The value of the dynamic parameter.
